ModMetaData.name: One With Death - Dubs Bad Hygiene Patch
ModMetaData.author: azrazalea
ModMetaData.description:
Compatibility patch between One With Death and Dubs Bad Hygiene.
Effects: - Undead are exempt from hygiene, bladder, and thirst needs (they're dead) - Necromancers with FamiliarWithDeath or OneWithDeath are exempt from bladder and thirst - OneWithDeath necromancers are also exempt from hygiene
This patch works with DBH's "Override Need Definitions" setting enabled.
Load after both One With Death and Dubs Bad Hygiene.
